other_title: ダンス ウィズ デビルス (Japanese)
plot: Ritsuka Tachibana is a female second-year high school student who attends Shiko Academy in Shiko Town. She enjoyed her school life while living with her mother Maria, but one day, that balance fell into ruin when she discovers several of her attractive, male classmate are demons.
opening_theme: "Kakusei no Air" (覚醒のAir; Air of Awakening) by Wataru Hatano
insert_song: "Crazy about you" by Sōma Saitō, Wataru Hatano, Takashi Kondo, Subaru Kimura, Daisuke Hirakawa, and Tatsuhisa Suzuki (ep 11)
"Dance with Destinies Overture" by Himeka Akaneya, Sōma Saitō, and Wataru Hatano (ep 4)
"Dance with Destinies" by Himeka Akaneya, Sōma Saitō, and Wataru Hatano (ep 12)
"EMO LIAR" by Takashi Kondo, Subaru Kimura, and Daisuke Hirakawa (ep 10)

"Itsuka Yume de Mita Basho e" (いつか夢で見た場所へ; Someday Towards The Place We Saw In A Dream) by Himeka Akaneya and Sōma Saitō (ep 8)
"Kaze no Yokan Acoustic" (風の予感 Acoustic; Premonition of Wind Acoustic) by Himika Akaneya (ep 3)
"Kaze no Yokan" (風の予感; Premonition of Wind) by Himika Akaneya (ep 1)
"KETTO ~Yuzurenai Semegiai~" (KETTO ~譲れない せめぎあい~ ; KETTO ~Unyielding Conflict~) by Sōma Saitō and Wataru Hatano (ep 9)
"Kimi Dake no Exorcist" (君だけのエクソシスト; Exorcist Only for You) by Wataru Hatano (ep 4)
"Renbin Youranka" (憐憫揺籃歌; Compassionate Lullaby) by Daisuke Hirakawa (ep 6)
"Wagana wa Rem Arlond" (我が名はレム・アーロンド; I'm Rem Arlond) by Sōma Saitō (ep 2)
"Warera Shiko Gakuen Seitokai" (我ら四皇學園生徒会; We, The Shiko Academy Student Council) by Sōma Saitō, Takashi Kondo, Subaru Kimura, Daisuke Hirakawa (ep 1)
"Watakushi wa Chūjitsuna Inu Desu" (ワタクシは忠実 な 犬 です; I am a Faithful Dog) by Tatsuhisa Suzuki (ep 7)
"Yami no Hanayome Reprise" (闇の花嫁 Reprise; Bride of Darkness Reprise) by Grimoire ensemble (ep 11)
